foods.title: Pancakes
foods.description:
**Fluffy pancakes topped with maple syrup and berries.**

- Whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, and a pinch of salt.
- In another bowl, mix milk, eggs, and melted butter.
- Combine both mixtures to form a smooth batter.
- Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
- Flip once bubbles form and cook until golden.
- Serve with maple syrup and fresh berries.

foods.title: Omelette
foods.description:
**Cheese and veggie-loaded omelette.**

- Crack eggs into a bowl, add salt and pepper, and whisk well.
- Heat a pan with oil or butter.
- Add chopped bell peppers and onions, sauté for a minute.
- Pour in the eggs and let them set.
- Sprinkle grated cheese on top.
- Fold and cook till golden, then serve hot.

foods.title: Avocado Toast
foods.description:
**Crunchy toast topped with creamy seasoned avocado.**

- Toast slices of bread to desired crispness.
- Scoop out ripe avocados into a bowl.
- Mash with lemon juice, salt, and chili flakes.
- Spread the avocado mix over toast.
- Garnish with extra chili flakes or herbs if desired.

foods.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
foods.description:
**Golden crispy sandwich with gooey melted cheese.**

- Butter two slices of bread evenly on one side.
- Place cheese slices between the unbuttered sides.
- Heat a pan and grill until golden on both sides.
- Press gently for even melting.
- Slice and serve hot.

foods.title: Chicken Burger
foods.description:
**Juicy grilled chicken burger with crisp veggies.**

- Grill or pan-fry chicken patty until fully cooked.
- Lightly toast burger buns.
- Spread mayo on both sides of the bun.
- Add lettuce, tomato slices, and the chicken patty.
- Assemble and serve with fries or salad.

foods.title: Veggie Wrap
foods.description:
**Healthy wrap packed with grilled veggies and hummus.**

- Warm tortillas on a pan.
- Grill bell peppers and zucchini until tender.
- Spread hummus on the tortilla.
- Add grilled veggies and lettuce.
- Roll tightly into a wrap and serve sliced.

foods.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
foods.description:
**Classic Italian pasta with hearty meat sauce.**

- Boil spaghetti until al dente, drain and set aside.
- Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil.
- Add ground beef and cook till browned.
- Pour in tomato sauce and simmer.
- Combine with spaghetti and serve hot with herbs or parmesan.

foods.title: Butter Chicken
foods.description:
**Rich and creamy Indian-style butter chicken.**

- Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
- Cook chicken until slightly charred.
- Prepare sauce with butter, tomato puree, and cream.
- Add chicken into the sauce and simmer.
- Serve with naan or rice.

foods.title: Margarita Pizza
foods.description:
**Classic thin-crust pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.**

- Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce.
- Add mozzarella slices evenly.
- Bake in a hot oven until crust is golden.
- Top with fresh basil and a drizzle of olive oil.
- Slice and serve hot.

foods.title: Chocolate Cake
foods.description:
**Moist chocolate sponge with rich cocoa flavor.**

- Mix flour, cocoa powder, and sugar in a bowl.
- Add eggs, melted butter, and milk to form batter.
- Pour into a greased baking tin.
- Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.
- Frost with chocolate icing if desired.

foods.title: Ice Cream Sundae
foods.description:
**Delicious ice cream topped with syrup, nuts, and whipped cream.**

- Scoop 2–3 flavors of ice cream into a bowl.
- Drizzle chocolate or caramel syrup generously.
- Add whipped cream on top.
- Sprinkle chopped nuts.
- Optionally top with a cherry.

foods.title: Fruit Salad
foods.description:
**Refreshing medley of seasonal fruits.**

- Chop apple, banana, mango, pineapple, and grapes.
- Add them to a bowl with a dash of lemon juice.
- Sprinkle mint leaves and mix well.
- Chill for 15 minutes before serving.

foods.title: Nachos
foods.description:
**Crispy nachos loaded with cheese and toppings.**

- Spread tortilla chips on a baking tray.
- Top with grated cheese and jalapeños.
- Bake until cheese melts.
- Serve with salsa and sour cream on the side.

foods.title: Smoothie Bowl
foods.description:
**Thick smoothie base topped with crunchy toppings.**

- Blend banana, mixed berries, and yogurt into a thick smoothie.
- Pour into a bowl.
- Top with granola, chia seeds, and extra fruit slices.
- Serve cold with a spoon.

foods.title: Sushi Rolls
foods.description:
**Delicate rolls filled with seafood and veggies.**

- Lay nori sheet on a mat and spread sushi rice.
- Add avocado, crab meat, and cucumber.
- Roll tightly using a sushi mat.
- Slice into bite-sized pieces.
- Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

foods.title: Tacos
foods.description:
**Crunchy or soft tortillas filled with flavorful meat and veggies.**

- Cook meat (beef or chicken) with taco seasoning.
- Warm up the tortillas.
- Add lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and cooked meat.
- Drizzle with salsa or sour cream.
- Serve immediately.

foods.title: Garlic Bread
foods.description:
**Toasty bread slices infused with garlic butter.**

- Mix butter with minced garlic and chopped parsley.
- Spread mixture on bread slices.
- Bake until golden and crisp.
- Serve hot with pasta or soup.

foods.title: Falafel Bowl
foods.description:
**A nutritious bowl with falafel, veggies, and tahini.**

- Prepare falafel or use store-bought.
- Cook rice and arrange in a bowl.
- Add falafel, cucumbers, tomatoes, and lettuce.
- Drizzle with tahini sauce and enjoy.

foods.title: Pasta Alfredo
foods.description:
**Creamy Alfredo pasta with garlic and cheese.**

- Boil penne pasta and drain.
- In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic.
- Add cream and grated parmesan.
- Stir in cooked pasta and mix until coated.
- Serve hot with herbs or extra cheese.

foods.title: Brownies
foods.description:
**Rich chocolate brownies with a fudgy texture and crunchy nuts.**

- Mix melted butter, sugar, cocoa powder, and eggs.
- Fold in flour and chopped walnuts.
- Pour into a greased tray and bake.
- Cool and cut into squares.
- Enjoy warm or chilled.

foods.title: Aloo Paratha
foods.description:
**Stuffed Indian flatbread with spiced mashed potatoes.**

- Boil and mash potatoes with spices, coriander, and green chili.
- Knead wheat flour dough and roll into discs.
- Place stuffing in center and seal edges.
- Roll gently and cook on a hot tawa with ghee.
- Serve hot with curd or pickle.

foods.title: Poha
foods.description:
**Light and flavorful flattened rice cooked with turmeric and veggies.**

- Rinse poha and keep aside.
- Heat oil and add mustard seeds, curry leaves, onions, and peas.
- Add turmeric and salt.
- Mix in the poha and cook for a few minutes.
- Garnish with coriander and serve with lemon wedges.

foods.title: Idli Sambar
foods.description:
**Soft steamed rice cakes served with a tangy lentil stew.**

- Prepare idli batter using soaked rice and urad dal.
- Steam in idli molds until fluffy.
- Cook sambar with dal, tamarind, and vegetables.
- Temper with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and chilies.
- Serve hot idli with sambar and chutney.

foods.title: Masala Dosa
foods.description:
**Crispy dosa filled with spiced potato mash, served with chutney.**

- Prepare dosa batter with rice and urad dal.
- Make a potato filling with mustard seeds, onions, and spices.
- Spread batter on a hot tawa into a thin crepe.
- Add filling and fold.
- Serve with coconut chutney and sambar.

foods.title: Rajma Chawal
foods.description:
**Comforting kidney bean curry served with steamed rice.**

- Soak and pressure cook rajma.
- Prepare onion-tomato masala with spices.
- Add rajma and simmer until thick.
- Cook basmati rice separately.
- Serve rajma over hot rice with onion rings.

foods.title: Dal Tadka
foods.description:
**Yellow lentils tempered with garlic, cumin, and red chili.**

- Cook toor dal with turmeric until soft.
- Heat ghee and add cumin, garlic, and red chili.
- Pour tempering over cooked dal.
- Simmer and serve hot with rice or roti.

foods.title: Chole Bhature
foods.description:
**Spicy chickpea curry paired with puffed deep-fried bread.**

- Soak and pressure cook chickpeas.
- Make onion-tomato masala with chole spices.
- Simmer until thick.
- Prepare dough with flour and yogurt, rest it.
- Roll and deep fry bhature until fluffy.
- Serve hot with onion salad.

foods.title: Mixed Veg Curry
foods.description:
**Colorful mix of vegetables cooked in aromatic gravy.**

- Chop carrots, beans, potatoes, and other veggies.
- Sauté onions, ginger, garlic, and tomatoes.
- Add spices and cook veggies until tender.
- Add water or cream to adjust consistency.
- Garnish with coriander and serve.

foods.title: Fried Rice
foods.description:
**Stir-fried rice with veggies and soy-based flavor.**

- Cook and cool basmati rice.
- Heat oil and sauté garlic, carrots, and capsicum.
- Add rice and toss with soy sauce and seasoning.
- Garnish with spring onion and serve hot.

foods.title: Paneer Butter Masala
foods.description:
**Cubes of paneer in rich and creamy tomato gravy.**

- Sauté paneer cubes lightly in butter (optional).
- Prepare base with tomato puree, onions, and spices.
- Add cream and butter, then simmer.
- Mix in paneer and cook gently.
- Serve with naan or jeera rice.

foods.title: Palak Paneer
foods.description:
**Creamy spinach curry with soft paneer cubes.**

- Blanch spinach leaves and blend into a puree.
- Sauté onions, garlic, and spices.
- Add spinach puree and simmer.
- Add paneer cubes and cook gently.
- Finish with a splash of cream and serve hot.

foods.title: Chicken Curry
foods.description:
**Hearty chicken curry with onion-tomato base and spices.**

- Marinate chicken with salt, turmeric, and yogurt.
- Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden.
- Add tomatoes and spices.
- Cook marinated chicken until tender.
- Garnish with coriander and serve with rice or roti.

foods.title: Biryani
foods.description:
**Aromatic rice dish with layers of meat or vegetables.**

- Marinate meat or veggies with yogurt and spices.
- Cook basmati rice with whole spices.
- Layer meat and rice, sprinkle saffron milk.
- Cover and cook on dum (steam).
- Serve with raita or salad.

foods.title: Chapati with Sabzi
foods.description:
**Soft wheat flatbreads served with seasonal vegetable curry.**

- Knead dough with wheat flour and water.
- Cook vegetables with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
- Roll dough into chapatis and cook on a hot tawa.
- Serve chapati with hot sabzi.

foods.title: Maggie Noodles
foods.description:
**Quick-cooked instant noodles with a veggie twist.**

- Boil water and add noodles and tastemaker.
- Add chopped vegetables like carrots and beans.
- Simmer until cooked.
- Serve hot for a comforting snack.

foods.title: Samosa
foods.description:
**Golden-fried pastry stuffed with spicy mashed potatoes.**

- Prepare filling with boiled potatoes, peas, and spices.
- Make dough using flour, oil, and water.
- Roll and fill samosa sheets, fold into cones.
- Deep fry until golden and crispy.
- Serve with chutney.

foods.title: Pakora
foods.description:
**Crispy Indian fritters made from vegetables and gram flour.**

- Slice vegetables like onions and potatoes.
- Make a thick batter with gram flour, spices, and water.
- Dip veggies and deep fry until golden.
- Serve hot with chutney or tea.

foods.title: Tea & Biscuits
foods.description:
**Traditional Indian chai served with crispy biscuits.**

- Boil milk and water with tea leaves and sugar.
- Add cardamom for aroma.
- Strain into cups and serve with assorted biscuits.

foods.title: Lassi
foods.description:
**Cool and creamy yogurt drink, sweet or salted.**

- Blend yogurt with sugar or salt.
- Add cardamom for flavor.
- Serve chilled with ice cubes.
- Garnish with mint or saffron if desired.

foods.title: Lemon Water
foods.description:
**Refreshing citrus drink perfect for hydration.**

- Squeeze lemon juice into chilled water.
- Add sugar or salt as preferred.
- Mix well and add mint leaves.
- Serve cold with ice.
